attributes.action: Stop surveillance of British citizens emails, social media and phone calls without a warrant
attributes.additional_details:
The following bills are all made to see all the information that we may deem personal to use of our daily lives. The Mastering the internet bill, Global telecoms exploitation bill and Tempora are all the culprits that I mentioned to this use.

In summary this gives the government the write to look at our private activity without a warrant this is a huge infringement of our human rights.

I would like to request an amendment of the bills for them to only to apply for people which have a warrant against them.  Since UK citizens should have a right to privacy.
